hoaloats Variant was an alteration to a spell taught by the Srinshee to Elminster Aumar.
Thoaloats Variant converted a given spells effect into one that allowed the caster to change a trees shape.
The verbal component had a limerick-like rhyme.
The Chosen of Mystra Elminster Aumar accidentally cast this spell in his exhaustion along the way between Moonshorn Tower and the Riven Stone in the .
